generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane paved surface with white lane markings, clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A paved area alongside the road, separated by a barrier, where pedestrians are visible.
- building: Illuminated structures are visible in the background on both sides of the road.
- fence: A dark barrier runs along the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- pole: Multiple vertical poles supporting streetlights are visible along the road.
- traffic light: Green traffic lights are visible at an intersection ahead.
- vegetation: Dark silhouettes of trees are visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: The dark, open sky is visible above the road, with a faint crescent moon.
- person: Blurry figures of pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a white car directly ahead and a dark car on the left.
- train: Tram tracks are visible embedded in the road surface, indicating the presence of a train (tram) system.
